directions.step:
Add 1 Tbls. ground ginger & 1 tsp. ground cinnamon. cut out & bake 2 animals for each toy ( one reversed). "Glue" together with confectioners' icing. Decorate with colored icing & candy; mount on 4 * 2" gingerbread platforms, adding round candies for wheels. Use red licorice shoestrings for pulls. Submitted By THESERVS@GATE.NET (THOMAS E. HAUG) On THU, 09 NOV 1995 172248 -0500
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
